name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sing Us A Song, Piano Man!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Piano Man will sing you a song, 9 o' clock every Saturday

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: At 9 PM each Saturday, Billy Joel's Piano Man will play through YouTube, with him announcing the time right as it happens.
